attributes.action: Stop Army personnal and spouses having to pay for Gas and electricity!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is absolute utter nonsense that people in the Army have to pay for gas and electricity as a army wife myself i think it is a disgrace. The Army deserve alot more than what they recieve, they do not get good enough wages. They do all this for their country and dont get nothing in return!
